long_description: Looking to give your first triathlon a shot without breaking the bank? Check out the women's Diamondback Interval, a fast bike with a 20-speed Shimano drivetrain and built-in aero bars. A feature that you'll definitely want for triathlons, the aero bars allow you to streamline your body position for maximum speed. Aero bars are easily detached by removing a bolt. The Interval is part of the Diamondback Devine Designs, a line of women's bikes with geometries specifically tailored to women riders with aesthetics to match. Butted 7005 alloy frame with formed top tube and integrated head tube offer high durability. Shimano Tiagra shifters, derailleurs and cassette plus an FSA VERO Compact crankset give you a drivetrain that is worthy of any task. Equation 700c aero deep dish rims laced to alloy hubs add a sleek, lightweight and aerodynamic wheelset to the mix. Tektro Rx3 Mini V brakes are controlled by Tektro ML730 2-finger brake levers with reach adjust for maximum stopping power. Specs on the women's Diamondback Interval are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: Looking to give your first triathlon a shot without breaking the bank? Check out the women's Diamondback Interval, a fast bike with a 20-speed Shimano drivetrain and built-in aero bars.
